name: ROOT DEFENDER
description:
You’ve come in for an urgent procedure that could mean life or death. The mutant lice pandemic affects all adults regardless of scalp conditions. With the implementation of project A.L.I.C.E, (Anti-Lice Infestation Control Exterminator) scientists have manufactured an AI nanobot to exterminate the pests slowly burrowing into your brain. You play as A.L.I.C.E, using W,A,S,D and the Mouse to control the character. The 1, 2 and 3 number keys will swap between your fists, gun and axe. Around the patient's scalp are zones of eggs and lice crawling around. The lice will either attempt to burrow into the patient's brain or begin sucking blood from their scalp. As an Anti-Lice Infestation Control Exterminator, you must navigate around the patient's scalp and exterminate lice.

MOUSE - camera

CLICK - attack

WSAD - move

Just kill as many lice as you can!!! AND HAVE FUN!
